name: FPS Demo (geekishninja)
description:
This prototype/demo is a four player local-multiplayer FPS inspired by games like Halo. Created over a time frame of around five and a half months as an exercise to get more practice with programming games and to learn more about developing for multiplayer. The game is open source and the code can be viewed at: https://github.com/ethan-moyer/FPSDemo_.

How to Play

Every time you kill a player, you get one point added to your score. The first to reach 25 points wins the game. To view the controls, press the Help button from the main menu.

HUD
  1. Grenade Counter (Bounce off objects)
  2. Sticky Grenade Counter (Stick to objects, players)
  3. Shield Bar (Depletes when you get hit)
  4. Health Bar  (Depletes when you get hit, but only if the shield bar is empty. When you run out of health, you die)
  5. Ammo Counter
  6. Score Counter
